properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.registerHealthIndicator
properties.description: Boolean property to determine whether (true) or not (false) a healthIndicator should be registered for each Circuit Breaker (requires Micrometer to be configured).

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.ringBufferSizeInClosedState
properties.description: Amount of requests stored in the ring buffer for Circuit Breaker's closed state.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.ringBufferSizeInHalfOpenState
properties.description: Amount of requests stored in the ring buffer for Circuit Breaker's open state.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.automaticTransitionFromOpenToHalfOpenEnabled
properties.description: Boolean property indicating whether (true) or not (false) Circuit Breakers are to automatically transition to Open state.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.waitDurationInOpenState
properties.description: A time-formatted string indicating the amount of time a Circuit Breaker should stay in open state.  Only obeyed if Circuit Breakers automatically transition to open state.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.failureRateThreshold
properties.description: An integer representation of the percentage of failures which must occur to trigger Circuit Breaker open state.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.eventConsumerBufferSize
properties.description: That's a good question... I'm really not sure what this value does or what it's doing described here.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.instance.serviceAlpha.baseConfig
properties.description: Name of the configuration to copy for this client's configuration.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.instance.serviceAlpha.ringBufferSizeInClosedState
properties.description: Amount of requests to track for Circuit Breaker mechanics on ServiceAlphaClient.
